title: Microsoft (MSFT) partners with OpenAI for enterprise AI suite
description: Microsoft deepens collaboration with OpenAI to roll out 'Azure AI Workbench' targeting Fortune 500s.
markdown: Microsoft announced a strategic expansion of its partnership with OpenAI. The new Azure AI Workbench includes GPT-based tools for HR, finance, and legal workflows. MSFT stock rose 1.5% on the news.

title: Tesla (TSLA) to expand Gigafactory Mexico with new battery lines
description: Tesla commits $1.2B to scale up EV battery production in Mexico.
markdown: CEO Elon Musk confirmed the expansion, citing lower manufacturing costs and supply chain proximity. TSLA shares jumped 3.1% as investors welcomed the move.

title: Amazon (AMZN) launches 'Project Nimbus' to rival Azure and GCP
description: Amazon unveils new government cloud deal aimed at defense and intelligence sectors.
markdown: AMZN stock saw a 0.8% uptick following news of Project Nimbus, a cloud platform designed for highly regulated environments. AWS will pilot this in collaboration with Lockheed Martin.

title: Apple Inc. faces lawsuit over antitrust violations in App Store policies
description: New York attorney general joins a multi-state probe into Appleâ€™s App Store revenue practices.
markdown: Legal filings accuse Apple of imposing unfair rules on developers. The lawsuit may impact service revenue streams. Apple responded that its practices are essential for user safety and platform integrity.

title: Tesla Cybertruck update expected Q3 2025
description: Production version teased on Tesla website with new off-road package.
markdown: The long-awaited Tesla Cybertruck is expected to enter full production in Q3 2025. Analysts see this as a key growth driver in TSLA's long-term strategy.
